segments.text: I am having a hard time at my job .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My colleagues quickly get promotions , while I always get sidelined . I don't know what to do anymore .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I don't know what else I can do . I am willing to work hard . Sometimes I make mistakes and the boss is not happy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mistakes are just a lessons to learn from .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He grew up poor in Kentucky and barely had a year of schooling , but he went on to become the President of United States .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He was also assassinated because of his views .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He is known as American's greatest president . Do you know why ? Because he fought against slavery and secession at a time in history where others were too afraid to do anything . He succeeded because of his ambition and generous spirit .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if he can become president , then I can at least get a promotion .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's the spirit . Never give up on your dream .
segments.speaker: S2
